Subject: Subscription
Date: March 23 2006

Dear sir,

Please sort out this problem, or I will need to ask for a refund.

Sincerely,
Harold Windsor

A NOTICE FROM THE HEALTH AND SAFETY DEPARTMENT

Health officials and experts agree that workers (1)……… do not get the appropriate amount of sleep every night are at risk of becoming unproductive. Tired workers are unable to concentrate and are more likely to have accidents while on the job. But how (2)……… sleep is enough?

Over time, you will be able to adjust to find the amount of sleep (3)……… is right for you.
